title: Life Coach for Overthinking – SEO-Optimized Draft Website (Bangalore)

requirements.text: Create a full single-page React website for a Life Coach specializing in Overthinking, based in Bangalore, targeting mid-career professionals. The site must include the following sections in order: Hero, About, Services, Testimonials, FAQ, and Contact/CTA. Structure the layout and content hierarchy inspired by coachshannonbeer.com – clean, warm, professional, trust-building, with ample whitespace and a calm authority tone.

quotes: Create a draft website for me (Life Coach for Overthining), I'm in Bangalore
Keep a reference website in mind: https://www.coachshannonbeer.com

acceptanceCriteria: All six sections (Hero, About, Services, Testimonials, FAQ, Contact/CTA) are visible and scroll correctly on a single page
Layout and tone mirror the calm, professional, conversion-focused style of coachshannonbeer.com
Content explicitly calls out Bangalore location and mid-career professional audience
Site is fully responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive visual theme with saffron (#F4A724 or close warm saffron) as the primary color for all CTA buttons, highlights, and key accents. Use subtle blue-to-indigo or green-to-indigo gradients sparingly (e.g., section backgrounds, dividers, or decorative elements). The base palette should be warm off-white/cream backgrounds with dark charcoal text for readability. Typography should be elegant and professional (e.g., serif for headings, clean sans-serif for body).

quotes: Keep a button color as saffron as theme
You can also use gradient blue / green / indigo color in fewer places

acceptanceCriteria: All primary CTA buttons use saffron color with appropriate hover state
Blue/green/indigo gradients appear in no more than 2–3 sections, used as backgrounds or decorative accents
No blue or purple used as dominant theme colors
Consistent typography with distinct heading and body styles throughout

requirements.text: Build the Hero section with a bold, empathetic headline targeting mid-career professionals who overthink (e.g., 'Stop Overthinking. Start Living Your Best Career.'). Include a subheadline, a saffron CTA button ('Book a Free Discovery Call'), and a professional hero image or gradient background. Add a subtle trust indicator (e.g., 'Based in Bangalore | Coaching Professionals Worldwide').
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section is full-viewport height on desktop
Headline is large, bold, and clearly addresses the overthinking pain point
Saffron CTA button is prominently displayed
Trust indicator mentioning Bangalore is visible

requirements.text: Build the About section introducing the life coach as an expert in helping mid-career professionals overcome overthinking. Include a placeholder professional photo slot, a personal story narrative, credentials/approach highlights, and a secondary saffron CTA. Use a warm, human tone that builds trust.
acceptanceCriteria: About section contains a photo placeholder, bio text, and highlighted credentials or methodology points
Tone is warm, credible, and relatable to mid-career professionals
A secondary CTA button in saffron is present

requirements.text: Build a Services section showcasing at least 3 coaching offerings relevant to overcoming overthinking for mid-career professionals (e.g., 1:1 Coaching, Group Program, Corporate Workshop). Each service card should have an icon, title, short description, and a saffron 'Learn More' or 'Get Started' button. Use a subtle blue-to-indigo gradient as the section background.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 service cards are displayed in a responsive grid
Each card has icon, title, description, and saffron CTA
Section background uses a subtle blue/indigo gradient

requirements.text: Build a Testimonials section with at least 3 placeholder client testimonials from mid-career professionals. Include name, role/industry, a short quote about overcoming overthinking, and a star rating. Use a carousel or grid layout. Add a subtle green-to-indigo gradient accent on this section.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 testimonial cards are displayed
Each testimonial includes name, role, quote, and star rating
Section uses a green/indigo gradient accent element

requirements.text: Build a FAQ section addressing common questions a mid-career professional might have before hiring an overthinking life coach (e.g., 'What is life coaching?', 'How many sessions do I need?', 'Do you coach online or in Bangalore?'). Implement as an accessible accordion component.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 5 FAQ items are shown in an accordion
Accordion opens/closes on click
Questions are relevant to the coaching niche and Bangalore context

requirements.text: Build a Contact/CTA section at the bottom of the page with a prominent headline (e.g., 'Ready to Quiet the Noise?'), a saffron 'Book a Free Discovery Call' button, and a simple contact form with fields: Name, Email, Phone (optional), and a short message. Also display the coach's Bangalore location.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form has Name, Email, Phone, and Message fields with basic validation
A large saffron CTA button is prominently placed above or alongside the form
Bangalore location is mentioned in the section
Form submission shows a success message (frontend only, no backend required)

requirements.text: Implement full on-page SEO optimization throughout the website: (1) Set a descriptive, keyword-rich <title> tag (e.g., 'Life Coach for Overthinking | Bangalore | Mid-Career Professionals'); (2) Add a compelling <meta name='description'> tag; (3) Include Open Graph meta tags (og:title, og:description, og:type); (4) Use proper semantic HTML5 elements: <header>, <nav>, <main>, <section>, <article>, <footer> with appropriate ARIA labels; (5) Use a single <h1> in the Hero, with <h2> for section headings and <h3> for sub-items; (6) Add JSON-LD structured data for a LocalBusiness schema with Bangalore address and coaching service type; (7) Ensure all images have descriptive alt attributes; (8) Add a canonical link tag.

quotes: create a website which is SEO enabled

acceptanceCriteria: <title> and <meta description> are keyword-rich and relevant to overthinking life coaching in Bangalore
Open Graph tags are present in the <head>
Page uses semantic HTML5 landmarks throughout
Heading hierarchy is correct: one H1, multiple H2s, H3s as needed
JSON-LD LocalBusiness structured data block is present in the <head>
All images have non-empty alt attributes
A canonical <link> tag is present

requirements.text: Add a sticky navigation bar at the top with the coach's name/brand, navigation links to each section (Home, About, Services, Testimonials, FAQ, Contact), and a saffron 'Book a Call' CTA button. The navbar should be accessible and collapse into a hamburger menu on mobile.
acceptanceCriteria: Navbar is sticky (fixed to top on scroll)
All section links scroll smoothly to the target section
Saffron 'Book a Call' button is visible in the navbar on desktop
Hamburger menu appears on mobile and toggles navigation links

requirements.text: Add a footer with the coach's name, a short tagline, quick links to all sections, social media placeholder icons (LinkedIn, Instagram), copyright notice with current year, and Bangalore location mention.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer contains brand name, tagline, section links, social icons, copyright, and location
Social icons are clickable placeholders
Footer is visually distinct from the main content

constraints: Saffron must be used as the primary button and accent color throughout — do not substitute with blue or purple as dominant colors
Blue/green/indigo gradients must appear sparingly (2–3 sections maximum) as backgrounds or accents only
No backend required — contact form submission should be handled frontend-only with a success state
All content must be in English and appropriate for a professional life coaching brand
nonGoals: No actual booking/calendar integration (CTA buttons are UI only for this draft)
No backend data persistence or user authentication
No real-time chat or messaging features

required: Warm, serene abstract hero background with soft light beams and calm textures evoking clarity and peace of mind, suitable for a coaching website (hero-bg.dim_1440x900.png)
Professional headshot placeholder silhouette with a warm saffron-tinted circular frame for the About section (coach-placeholder.dim_400x400.png)
Minimalist saffron and indigo abstract icon set: three icons representing 1-on-1 coaching, group sessions, and corporate workshops (service-icons.dim_512x512.png)
